img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat. The environment is a barren, rocky landscape. The character is wielding a weapon and appears to be striking an opponent, causing a burst of red energy or blood. On the screen, there are two health bars labeled "King of Flowing Sands" and "Second Rat Prince," indicating a battle between these entities. Various icons and gauges are visible on the screen, suggesting gameplay elements such as health, abilities, or items.
